text: Really nice! I wasn't aware until now you're using Janet for the scripting. Also, I see you mute patterns using '(pat!)', is that just a command that kills the old pattern and ignores the rest of its arguments?
Yes, that's right, just a command that accepts any number of args.  I also have a starter-for-10 Ixi lang implementation, which I find far more intuitive for making music.
